channel.title: briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: London Became a Global Hub for Phone Theft. Now We Know Why.
item.description: About 80,000 phones were stolen in the British capital last year. The police are finally discovering where many of them went.

item.title: Thousands of federal employees are getting laid off. Will a judge intervene?
item.description: Unions representing federal employees have asked a federal judge in San Francisco to halt the Trump administration's latest round of layoffs, which ar...

item.title: Scientists are modifying wildlife DNA. Should these species be released into nature?
item.description: Scientists are researching ways to genetically modify plants and animals to be more resistant to threats like climate change. The IUCN is voting on wh...

item.title: What Are Tomahawk Missiles, and Why Might Trump Give Them to Ukraine?
item.description: Largely used by naval forces for more than 40 years, Ukraine could receive a newly developed land-based launcher to strike Moscow and beyond.

item.title: Chicago’s Uprising Against ICE, and 80,000 Stolen Phones
item.description: Plus, there may be lead in your protein supplements.

item.title: In rural America, scarce doctors battle misinformation as they practice medicine
item.description: Conspiracy theories about health fill a vacuum created by the lack of doctors in many rural communities. Meanwhile, doctors in these areas say patient...

item.title: Israel keeps Gaza border crossing closed while reducing aid deliveries
item.description: The ceasefire on Wednesday was largely holding, although Hamas described Israeli attacks in Gaza as violations of the agreement.

item.title: U.S. charges Cambodian tycoon in massive alleged cryptocurrency scam

item.title: Syria’s New Leaders Are Talking to Russia, a Former Enemy
item.description: President Ahmed al-Shara is making his first trip to Moscow, which backed the regime his rebels overthrew. Both sides have reasons to put the past asi...

item.title: Raila Odinga, Former Prime Minister of Kenya, Dies at 80
item.description: A pivotal political leader who helped usher in multiparty democracy, he ran unsuccessfully for the presidency five times.

item.title: Trump’s Tariff Fight With China Means Trouble for a Vast Wilderness in Brazil
item.description: Brazilian farmers are lobbying to roll back deforestation restrictions in order to sell more soybeans to the huge Chinese market.
